description: Provides cloud browser automation capabilities using Stagehand and Browserbase, enabling LLMs to interact with web pages, take screenshots, and run parallel sessions in a cloud browser environment.

proxies.description: Whether or not to use Browserbase proxies

keepAlive.description: Whether or not to keep the Browserbase session alive

modelName.description: The model to use for Stagehand (default: gemini-2.0-flash)

modelApiKey.description: API key for the custom model provider. Required when using a model other than the default gemini-2.0-flash

advancedStealth.description: Use advanced stealth mode. Only available to Browserbase Scale Plan users

browserbaseApiKey.description: The Browserbase API Key to use

browserbaseProjectId.description: The Browserbase Project ID to use

capabilities.name: browserbase_session_create
capabilities.description: Create or reuse a Browserbase browser session and set it as active.

capabilities.name: browserbase_session_close
capabilities.description: Close the current Browserbase session and reset the active context.

capabilities.name: browserbase_stagehand_navigate
capabilities.description:
Navigate to a URL in the browser. Only use this tool with URLs you're confident will work and be up to date. 
    Otherwise, use https://google.com as the starting point

capabilities.name: browserbase_stagehand_act
capabilities.description: Perform a single action on the page (e.g., click, type).

capabilities.name: browserbase_stagehand_extract
capabilities.description: Extract structured data or text from the current page using an instruction.

capabilities.name: browserbase_stagehand_observe
capabilities.description: Find interactive elements on the page from an instruction; optionally return an action.

capabilities.name: browserbase_screenshot
capabilities.description: Capture a full-page screenshot and return it (and save as a resource).

capabilities.name: browserbase_stagehand_get_url
capabilities.description: Return the current page URL (full URL with query/fragment).

capabilities.name: browserbase_stagehand_agent
capabilities.description: Execute a task autonomously using Gemini Computer Use agent. The agent will navigate and interact with web pages to complete the given task.
